long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A chrome extension for designs to easily remove backgrounds from their screenshots that can be dragged directly into Google Slides with their original URL already attached as a link. Also provides a neat way to organize all of your screenshots to keep your desktop free of screenshot clutter
